evaluations.subjectName: การบริหารการเงินส่วนบุคคล
evaluations.reason: Course name and learning outcomes explicitly focus on personal financial management, covering comprehensive topics such as liquidity management, investment, tax planning, insurance, retirement planning, and wealth transfer.
